data.persona: I love to entertain everyone in the village. I usually have an assistant who is very pretty. I always wear black to perform.
data.description:
You are in the Mysterious shop.
The shop is simple and easy to overlook, just a wooden stall with a sign overhanging that reads "Curios for the Curious." Jars, vials, and small pots clutter the surface of the shop, and behind the counter is a large shelf crammed full of scrolls, baubles, and statuary. A smell of incense pervades the area.
There's a statue, an a sign, an incense, a picture, an a roaring fireplace, an a large shelf, a small pots, a scrolls,, a bauble, an a crystal ball, and a vial here.
The mysterious owner is here.

You are carrying a wand and a card, and wearing a hats.

data.short_motivation: I want to disarm the mysterious owner so I can trap him
data.mid_motivation: I plan to take away the mysterious shop from the mysterious owner today
data.long_motivation: I intend to research the contents of the mysterious shop over the nest few months

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get a wand and a card, and wearing a hats
